name: Aggressive Duck (DanielOschepkov)
description:
The story

3042 year, there are no people anymore, only the ducks remained. Ducks created their own civilization, but the aliens are trying to capture it! You are the last hope of the duck society, who can prevent the invasion!

Gameplay

The game, where you play as a duck (really cool duck) to defeat the aliens (yes, they are also ducks), who are trying to capture the Earth. What can you do? well, you can shoot! How much time can you hold out against the aliens? There are few types of enemies, and also bonuses.

Control W,A,S,D - movement E - shoot ESC - close game (all progress will be closed) Support the developer

This game developed by a single person, who is an independent developer from Russia. You can support me, by donating on itch.io or donating to "Buy me a coffee" https://www.buymeacoffee.com/SpeakerFish

License

The game design, game code, visual game assets (characters, sprites and other visual stuff) created by me

The music and sounds are taken from zvukipro.com
